title: The Supreme Court Shifts to the Right
itunes:title: The Supreme Court Shifts to the Right
description:
Stephen Vladeck, a professor of constitutional law at the University of Texas Law School, discusses the Supreme Court's term with its new conservative majority.

Greg Farrell, Bloomberg legal reporter, discusses former President Donald Trump's legal peril.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
